last_episode_to_air.name: Love in the Future #20
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Tai Che Ni is a cheerful and diligent delivery worker in the year 2000. He has been given an item to deliver to a man named Hai Yi. But something very strange happens to him – and he suddenly finds himself transported 22 years into the future...to the year 2022! He finds Hai Yi, the young heir to a massively lucrative business group empire.

At first, Tai Che Ni is utterly distraught by the fact that he has been brought to the year 2022 – and longs to return “home” to 2000. But as he begins to spend time with Hai Yi, he starts to become attracted to him – and discovers a tender side to the business heir that many of his acquaintances have never seen before. Could he find happiness here in 2022? Or will the pull of the past separate this duo? Meanwhile, love could also be set to bloom between a seemingly cold-hearted company manager Liang Wen Hsen, and the office’s newest recruit – a tender-hearted orphan named Lin Huai En.

name: HIStory
overview: Drama anthology series where each season presents stand-alone stories with different plots and main characters focusing on the theme of boys' love, also known as BL.

seasons.name: Season 1: My Hero, Stay Away From Me & Obsessed
seasons.overview:
My Hero • After dying, a young girl's soul takes over the body of a lonely boy to try to be with her boyfriend once again.

Stay Away From Me • When their parents get married and leave for a long honeymoon, superstar Cheng Qing moves in with his new stepbrother Feng He.

Obsessed • After a fatal accident, a heartbroken Shao Yi-chen becomes reborn and vows to alter his own fate by avoiding the love of his life.

seasons.name: HIStory 2: Right or Wrong & Crossing the Line
seasons.overview:
Right or Wrong • The story is about a cynical father and a college student who get together after some odd circumstances arise.

Crossing the Line • When an injury sidelines a high school senior from the volleyball team, he develops feelings for a recruit. Two stepbrothers try to suppress their love.

seasons.name: Season 3: Trapped & Make Our Days Count
seasons.overview:
Trapped • The story of a police officer who becomes trapped in the underworld, as he develops feelings for a gang leader...

Make Our Days Count • At first glance, high schoolers Xiang Hao Ting and Yu Xi Gu appear to be polar opposites; Xiang Hao Ting is an outgoing, hot-headed extrovert and some-time bully, Yu Xi Gu keeps a low profile and focuses on his schoolwork.

They seem bound for completely different futures—the bookish Yu Xi Gu looks destined for academic success, while life is just a long popularity contest for Xiang Hao Ting.

seasons.name: Season 4: Close To You
seasons.overview:
Xiao Li Cheng, the manager of the sales division in a wedding planning company, is straightforward and bold. In order to court his first love, Liu Mei Fang, a fujoshi, he asks another man, Teng Mu Ren, to pretend to be his "date" in order to get Mei Fang's attention. However, he ends up falling in love with Mu Ren.

Fu Yong Jie is a medical student who is double-faced, especially towards his older stepbrother, Ye Xing Si, who is innocent and warm. Sparks begin to appear between them.

seasons.name: Season 5: Love in the Future
seasons.overview:
Tai Che Ni is a cheerful and diligent delivery worker in the year 2000. He has been given an item to deliver to a man named Hai Yi. But something very strange happens to him – and he suddenly finds himself transported 22 years into the future...to the year 2022! He finds Hai Yi, the young heir to a massively lucrative business group empire.

At first, Tai Che Ni is utterly distraught by the fact that he has been brought to the year 2022 – and longs to return “home” to 2000. But as he begins to spend time with Hai Yi, he starts to become attracted to him – and discovers a tender side to the business heir that many of his acquaintances have never seen before. Could he find happiness here in 2022? Or will the pull of the past separate this duo? Meanwhile, love could also be set to bloom between a seemingly cold-hearted company manager Liang Wen Hsen, and the office’s newest recruit – a tender-hearted orphan named Lin Huai En.

episodes.name: My Hero #01
episodes.overview: After dying, a young girl's soul takes over the body of a lonely boy to try to be with her boyfriend once again. However, she has one week for her boyfriend to fall in love with her new body. Or else both her and the boy's body dies.

episodes.name: Stay Away From Me #01
episodes.overview: When their parents get married and leave for a long honeymoon, superstar Cheng Qing moves in with his new stepbrother Feng He. With Meng Meng, his fujoshi best friend, starts dreaming of the perfect BL fanfic, she tries to push the two together. Will Feng He be able to stay away from his brother?

episodes.overview: When their parents get married and leave for a long honeymoon, superstar Cheng Qing moves in with his new stepbrother Feng He. With Meng Meng, his fujoshi best friend, starts dreaming of the perfect BL fanfic, she tries to push the two together. Will Feng He be able to stay away from his brother?

episodes.name: Obsessed #01
episodes.overview: Shao Yi Chen is a man who dies in an accident involving his boyfriend, Jiang Jing Teng. Shao Yi Chen is reborn and sent back 9 years. To save his future self he avoids Jiang Jing Teng and avoids his feelings for him. Problem is Shao Yi Chen has loved Jiang Jing Teng for a long time and has written about him in his diary. While destroying the diary, Jiang Jing  Teng discovers a few pages. Causing Jiang Jing Teng to become curious about Shao Yi Chen. Will he resist the love of the handsome man Jiang Jing Teng and save his future self, or will he fall for the same man twice and risk his life?

1.name: Season 1: My Hero, Stay Away From Me & Obsessed
1.overview:
My Hero • After dying, a young girl's soul takes over the body of a lonely boy to try to be with her boyfriend once again.

Stay Away From Me • When their parents get married and leave for a long honeymoon, superstar Cheng Qing moves in with his new stepbrother Feng He.

Obsessed • After a fatal accident, a heartbroken Shao Yi-chen becomes reborn and vows to alter his own fate by avoiding the love of his life.

episodes.name: Right or Wrong #01
episodes.overview:
The story is about a cynical father and a college student who get together after some odd circumstances arise.

Shi Yi Jie, a divorced, single man, is an associate professor at The Department of Anthropology. He has an 8-year-old daughter named Yo Yo.  He single-handedly raises his daughter. After encountering Fei Sheng Zhe by accident, the three of them become a family.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line #01
episodes.overview: He Cheng Hen and Zi Xuan, respectively captain and manager of the School's volleyball team pick interest in Xia Yu Hao after they see him effortlessly leap over a fence when trying to get away from the school director. He Cheng Hen begins a relentless chase after Xia Yu Hao in an attempt to recruit him for the team. After causing a ruckus in class, Xia Yu Hao is ordered to join the volleyball team by the coach. Zi Xuan goes to look for Xia Yu Hao after he misses training and finds out he's working part-time at a dangerous club. He steps in to take a beating for Xia Yu Hao, indefinitely catching his attention.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line #02
episodes.overview: Xia Yu Hao is a bit of a playful troublemaker in high school but is one day roped into the high-school volleyball team. There, he meets Qiu Zi Xuan, a senior and trainer of the team, and sparks start flying when the both of them clash. The two of them find themselves bonding over the sport and, as Yu Hao gradually discovers more about Zi Xuan, feelings start to develop. Can he keep his feelings to himself or will he end up crossing the line?

2.name: HIStory 2: Right or Wrong & Crossing the Line
2.overview:
Right or Wrong • The story is about a cynical father and a college student who get together after some odd circumstances arise.

Crossing the Line • When an injury sidelines a high school senior from the volleyball team, he develops feelings for a recruit. Two stepbrothers try to suppress their love.

episodes.name: Trapped #01
episodes.overview:
The story of a police officer who becomes trapped in the underworld, as he develops feelings for a gang leader...

Four years ago, a veteran cop and an elderly gangster were killed in a gunshot attack. The only survivor and the dead gangster's protegee, the enigmatic and ruthless Tang Yi, is now the new gang leader, who will stop at nothing to find the murderer and plans an elaborate trap to lure him out of hiding. Honest police officer Meng Shao Fei is obsessed with knowing the truth behind this case, to avenge his mentor's death, and spends all his spare time tracking Tang Yi and trying to find what he is up to. When Meng and Tang Yi are kidnapped together and forced to survive in a cold mountain, things start to change between them.

episodes.name: Trapped #18
episodes.overview:
The story of a police officer who becomes trapped in the underworld, as he develops feelings for a gang leader...

Four years ago, a veteran cop and an elderly gangster were killed in a gunshot attack. The only survivor and the dead gangster's protegee, the enigmatic and ruthless Tang Yi, is now the new gang leader, who will stop at nothing to find the murderer and plans an elaborate trap to lure him out of hiding. Honest police officer Meng Shao Fei is obsessed with knowing the truth behind this case, to avenge his mentor's death, and spends all his spare time tracking Tang Yi and trying to find what he is up to. When Meng and Tang Yi are kidnapped together and forced to survive in a cold mountain, things start to change between them.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #01
episodes.overview: Hao Ting and Xi Gu are the most popular guys in the school. The two weren't close until Hao Ting's girlfriend Si Yu hugged Xi Gu one day.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #02
episodes.overview: Si Yu is interested in Xi Gu. Their classmates become suspicious of their relationship. Hao Ting's friends misunderstand that it's Xi Gu who's hitting on Si Yu, so they meet him on the rooftop.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #03
episodes.overview: Si Yu confesses her reason for approaching Xi Gu and the two reconcile. Bo Xiang comes to Zhi Gang's store to apologize. But that angers Zhi Gang even more.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #04
episodes.overview: In order to take revenge, Hao Ting locks Xi Gu in his own place, causing Xi Gu to miss his exam. Xi Gu is furious and hits Hao Ting.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #05
episodes.overview: Hao Ting is avoiding Si Yu, and confesses his feelings for Xi Gu to Bo Xiang. Si Yu and her friends find out that Xi Gu sneaks into a club.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #06
episodes.overview: Hao Ting asks Bo Xiang how to get attention from a guy. Zhi Gang is hurt. Bo Xiang decides to make a confession.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #07
episodes.overview: Hao Ting meets up with Si Yu, and suggests a break-up. Hao Ting hears about Bo Xiang being rejected, and goes to where Zhi Gang works at.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #08
episodes.overview: Hao Ting comes to Xi Gu's classroom, and invites him to have lunch together. He also requests Bo Xiang to ask Zhi Gang about Xi Gu.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #09
episodes.overview: Xi Gu is reported by someone for entering a gay bar. He is called over to the disciplinary office. Hao Ting claims that the photo was photoshopped by him in order to get Xi Gu out of trouble. Xi Gu doesn't believe what Hao Ting says.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #10
episodes.overview: Hao Ting asks Xi Gu to study with him in order to prepare for the exam. Xi Gu tells Hao Ting about his family, and expresses how jealous he feels as Hao Ting can be always so carefree.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #11
episodes.overview: Bo Xiang is cleaning up the gym room when Zhi Gang comes out of the shower. Xi Gu and Hao Ting have a date. When they are at home, Hao Ting's parents return.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #12
episodes.overview: Bo Xiang's brother meets up with Zhi Gang, and hands out a condom to him. Xi Gu arrives Hao Ting's place, hoping to have a talk with his parents.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #13
episodes.overview: Zhi Gang is on the bridge alone, but Bo Xiang finds him. Bo Xiang says his new year wish is to take Zhi Gang home, and that his parents would accept their relationship.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #14
episodes.overview: Xi Gu arrives Hao Ting's home. He conceals his nervousness with his smile. Hao Ting's parents give him a test.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #15
episodes.overview: Hao Ting plans to celebrate Xi Gu's 18th birthday with him, so he brings a cake to his place. The two spend a sweet night. But the next day, Hao Ting is nowhere to be found.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #16
episodes.overview: Hao Ting's result is out. He successfully gets into the preferred university. His parents therefore agree to let Hao Ting and Xi Gu date.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #17
episodes.overview: Xi Gu pushes Hao Ting away when Hao Ting is getting intimate with him. Hao Ting mistakes it as Xi Gu being scared of him. On the other hand, Xi Gu is unsure why he's pushing Hao Ting away.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #18
episodes.overview: Hao Ting rents a place for Xi Gu. The two begin to live together. They invite their friends over for meal. Xi Gu is very happy with such life.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #19
episodes.overview: Hao Ting is ready to go to America. Before leaving, he meets up with friends. Zhi Gang's business is growing bigger and bigger, and he has started to live with Bo Xiang.

episodes.name: Make Our Days Count #20
episodes.overview: Hao Ting is looking for outfits with his sister, and bumps into his ex-girlfriend. After saying their goodbye, Hao Ting runs to where he used to live, and cry while looking at the stuff from the past. After years of working hard, Zhi Gang finally takes his boyfriend to his home.

3.name: Season 3: Trapped & Make Our Days Count
3.overview:
Trapped • The story of a police officer who becomes trapped in the underworld, as he develops feelings for a gang leader...

Make Our Days Count • At first glance, high schoolers Xiang Hao Ting and Yu Xi Gu appear to be polar opposites; Xiang Hao Ting is an outgoing, hot-headed extrovert and some-time bully, Yu Xi Gu keeps a low profile and focuses on his schoolwork.

They seem bound for completely different futures—the bookish Yu Xi Gu looks destined for academic success, while life is just a long popularity contest for Xiang Hao Ting.

episodes.name: Close to You #01
episodes.overview: Li Cheng falls in love immediately when the new colleague Mi Fang enters the office of Muse Weddings. In order to catch her attention, Li Cheng quickly asks for help from his friends Mu Ren and Hsing Si. However, no matter what Li Cheng does, Mi Fang doesn't seem to care.

episodes.name: Close to You #02
episodes.overview: Xiao Li Cheng, without understanding the true meaning, shares with Mei Fang's friend that he is also a fan of BL in an attempt to get closer to her.  Xing Si returns home from work early with a fever, but a mysterious person is already inside the house, watching him.

episodes.name: Close to You #03
episodes.overview: Li Cheng finally becomes closer with Mei Fang through her interest in BL. But Mei Fang starts to imagine things for Li Cheng and Mu Ren too. Li Cheng decides to act as if he has a crush on his friend, as he knows that Mei Fang likes it.

episodes.name: Close to You #04
episodes.overview: Following the scuffle between Mu Ren and Yong Jie, Xing Si forces his step-brother to apologize for starting a fight. The solution is not suitable for Li Cheng, however, who challenges Yong Jie to a boxing match to settle the score.

episodes.name: Close to You #05
episodes.overview: Li Cheng is so glad that he is able to talk with Mei Fang, but then Mei Fang asked him a question he's too confused to answer! This also creates tension between Li Cheng and Mu Ren.

episodes.name: Close to You #06
episodes.overview: Fu Yong Jie takes Xing Si to a bar where he impresses him with his bartending skills. However, Xing Si panics when he realizes what the two have done when he wakes up the next morning.

episodes.name: Close to You #07
episodes.overview: Mu Ren's team received a big project. Manager Teng decided to hold a celebration dinner, but his real intention is to drug Mu Ren. Li Cheng came to save Mu Ren at the critical moment. After seeing Mu Ren in an unconscious state, Li Cheng somehow felt attracted to him.

episodes.name: Close to You #08
episodes.overview: After ignoring all communication from Yong Jie, Xing Si receives a concerning message from Yong Jie leading him to finally speaking to him once more. When Xing Si takes Yong Jie home, he is welcomed by his family and encouraged to visit more frequently.

episodes.name: Close to You #09
episodes.overview: After hearing Xing Si's recommendation, Li Cheng was no longer confused. He's sure about his feelings for Teng Teng, and he decides to go for it! Meanwhile, Mu Ren thought he's solved the awkward situation, and suggested a hot springs trip.

episodes.name: Close to You #10
episodes.overview: Yong Jie gives Xing Si his journals from the past few years as evidence of his true feelings. After reading, Xing Si decides to invite Yong Jie on the spa trip after all, however he doesn't anticipate Yong Jie and Li Cheng to team up to carry out their love missions.

episodes.name: Close to You #11
episodes.overview: What does it take to be together? If they can't be lovers, can they still remain friends or brothers? Yong Jie is waiting for Xing Si's answer, while Li Cheng awaits for Mu Ren's reply.

episodes.name: Close to You #12
episodes.overview: Mu Ren goes on yet another date with Gill, forcing Li Cheng to perceive that Mu Ren is avoiding spending any time with him at all. Fu Yong Jie admits to his father his true feelings for Xing Si.

episodes.name: Close to You #13
episodes.overview: Li Cheng decides to hide his feelings for Mu Ren. Meanwhile, there's a rumor about Li Cheng and Mei Fang. Mu Ren becomes annoyed, and finally realizes his feelings deep down.

episodes.name: Close to You #14
episodes.overview: Xing Si has an honest conversation with his father. Mu Ren and Li Cheng are forced to address the office rumor.

episodes.name: Close to You #15
episodes.overview: Xing Si is relieved as his father finally accepts him and it is time he moves out from the dormitory. Li Cheng and Mu Ren feel upset but happy at the same time that Xing Si is leaving. Xing Si reminds Mu Ren to be brave about his relationship with Li Cheng before he leaves.

episodes.name: Close to You #16
episodes.overview: Mu Ren and Li Cheng go on a pottery date where they bump into some familiar faces. Yong Jie and Xing Si plan to appeal to their father/step-father together.

episodes.name: Close to You #17
episodes.overview: Manager Teng is back! His return means the danger of Li Cheng as he might be fired! Though, Li Cheng is acting like he doesn't care, he is, in fact, scared to death inside. Mu Ren wants to help him, but doesn't know how. Xing Si and Yong Jie agreed to talk with the parents together, to ask for their approval.

episodes.name: Close to You #18
episodes.overview: Li Cheng acts unbothered by the accusations against him, but privately he desperately searches for evidence for his defense. Mu Ren and Mei Fang join the search for anything they can use against Vice President Gao.

episodes.name: Close to You #19
episodes.overview: Li Cheng falls into the trap of Manager Teng. In order to rescue him, Mu Ren plans to help. But Li Cheng doesn't know about his plan, and gets furious when he misunderstands that Mu Ren is cheating on him! But at the end, the two are able to grow closer through such misunderstanding.

episodes.name: Close to You #20
episodes.overview: Xing Si, Yong Jie, Li Cheng, and Mu Ren attend the wedding of Sun Bo and Lu Zhi.

4.name: Season 4: Close To You
4.overview:
Xiao Li Cheng, the manager of the sales division in a wedding planning company, is straightforward and bold. In order to court his first love, Liu Mei Fang, a fujoshi, he asks another man, Teng Mu Ren, to pretend to be his "date" in order to get Mei Fang's attention. However, he ends up falling in love with Mu Ren.

Fu Yong Jie is a medical student who is double-faced, especially towards his older stepbrother, Ye Xing Si, who is innocent and warm. Sparks begin to appear between them.

episodes.name: Love in the Future #1
episodes.overview:
Tai Che Ni is a cheerful and diligent delivery worker in the year 2000. He has been given an item to deliver to a man named Hai Yi. But something very strange happens to him – and he suddenly finds himself transported 22 years into the future...to the year 2022! He finds Hai Yi, the young heir to a massively lucrative business group empire.

At first, Tai Che Ni is utterly distraught by the fact that he has been brought to the year 2022 – and longs to return “home” to 2000. But as he begins to spend time with Hai Yi, he starts to become attracted to him – and discovers a tender side to the business heir that many of his acquaintances have never seen before. Could he find happiness here in 2022? Or will the pull of the past separate this duo? Meanwhile, love could also be set to bloom between a seemingly cold-hearted company manager Liang Wen Hsen, and the office’s newest recruit – a tender-hearted orphan named Lin Huai En.

episodes.name: Love in the Future #19
episodes.overview:
Tai Che Ni is a cheerful and diligent delivery worker in the year 2000. He has been given an item to deliver to a man named Hai Yi. But something very strange happens to him – and he suddenly finds himself transported 22 years into the future...to the year 2022! He finds Hai Yi, the young heir to a massively lucrative business group empire.

At first, Tai Che Ni is utterly distraught by the fact that he has been brought to the year 2022 – and longs to return “home” to 2000. But as he begins to spend time with Hai Yi, he starts to become attracted to him – and discovers a tender side to the business heir that many of his acquaintances have never seen before. Could he find happiness here in 2022? Or will the pull of the past separate this duo? Meanwhile, love could also be set to bloom between a seemingly cold-hearted company manager Liang Wen Hsen, and the office’s newest recruit – a tender-hearted orphan named Lin Huai En.
